commands.name: lint-staged
commands.summary: Used by the pre-commit Git hook. This command invokes lint-staged to reformat staged changes.

commands.name: test
commands.summary: Builds all projects and runs their tests.

commands.name: build
commands.summary: Build all projects that haven't been built, or have changed since they were last built
